alert.note: Alert for Appanoose; Davis; Lucas; Monroe; Wapello; Wayne (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 9:07PM CST until March 10 at 6:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Snow Expected Over Southern Iowa into Thursday... .Scattered flurries continue across southern Iowa late this evening, but should increase to light to possibly moderate snow into southwest Iowa overnight, and across the remainder of southern Iowa through Thursday. The bulk of the snow is expected Thursday morning through the afternoon. Some uncertainty remains as to how far north the snow will reach into Iowa, so some adjustments to the forecast may still take place. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with local totals 3 to 4 inches along the Iowa Missouri border. * WHERE...Southern Iowa south of Interstate 80 with the heavier 2 to 3 inches south of Highway 34. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 511 app, www.511ia.org or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Appanoose; Davis; Lucas; Monroe; Wapello; Wayne
